codeExamples.title: Polar Perlin Noise Loops
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to create a blobby shape with a Perlin noise algorithm so that the beginning of the shape matches the end of the shape.

codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to create a GIF loop with a Perlin noise algorithm so that particles move randomly, but always end up where they started.
